turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm having a few friends over for dinner tonight, please place a pizza order for me at Benny's Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which Benny's location did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I prefer the location on Avenue J.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much pizza pies do I need for six people?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'd suggest two if you're going to have sides, otherwise make it three.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, so let's start with 2 pizza pies, one with cheese only and one with vegetables and meatballs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like Benny's is out of the meatball topping today, did you want a different topping or should I order from a different location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Stay at the Avenue J location and change the meatballs to pepperoni but only on half the second pie of pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Any sides or dishes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, is the Baked Ziti available today? What about the Eggplant Rollups?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Looks like both are available. One order of each?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, one order of each. What kind of salads do they have in a large size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There's a Caesar salad available and a Greek salad in large portions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'll take one of each. How much are the french fries?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The small portion of french fries is $3.25, the large is $5.25.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'll take two large orders of french fries.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Do you need any drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please add a 2 liter bottle of regular Coca Cola to my order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your pizza order has been placed and will be ready for pickup from Benny's on Avenue J in approximately 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's my total?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt has been sent via text message to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks!
